author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a further follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47892 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48114.
It solves the problem spotted at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47708#issuecomment-2884694870 in which wf 29634.75 is failing in the current IB on ARM platforms. 
I also reproduced the same issue by running `runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 29634.751 -t 4 -j 8` in a regular IB with arch `el9_amd64_gcc12`.

#### PR validation:

Tested successfully via `runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -l 29634.751 --nEvents 500 -t 4 -j 8` both under `el9_amd64_gcc12` and `el8_aarch64_gcc12`.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, not to be backported.
title: Further fixes for HGCal validation at HLT
